content_descriptors.notes:
The Black Labyrinth contains the following content:
-Risque outfits, sexual comments and adult situations
-Sex Scenes (consensual/non consensual sex, public nudity and sex with fantasy characters, tentacles, machines.
-Sex with magical and mythical monsters (tentacles and floating eye monsters)
-Forced Sex with Monster and mythical beings
-Cartoon/Fantasy Violence
-All characters in The Black Labyrinth are 18+ and over

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0GHz 以上
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 9
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0GHz 以上
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 9
